item.title: DC/OS Service Accounts in Restricted Environments
item.description: We are so used to having handy little pieces of software that help us do our jobs better. If you too work in the DevOps world and write automation for infrastructure or software (or pretty much anything else) you would know what I mean. Take jq for an example: can you imagine writing any sort of shell script that interacts with any JSON producing API and NOT using good ole trustworthy jq?
